entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:18 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 10:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow except rain over southern sections this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
